content.prompt: Dr. Whitlock is conducting an experimental study on the effectiveness of antipsychotic medication. Which of the following will most likely be her dependent variable?

choices.label: Type of medication, because this is the variable she is manipulating.
Frequency of auditory hallucinations, because this is the variable she is measuring.
Self-reported depression, because this is the variable she is manipulating.
Serotonin levels, because this is the variable she is measuring.

skill.text: 2.B: Evaluate the appropriate use of research design elements in experimental methodology.
